-Must run the Vendor C# Solution using Visual Studio
-While C# running. Open the UI project vending-machine-ui-master using VS Code 
-On VS Code terminal write command ng serve --open

Page 1 of the Project: Vending Machine

url: http://localhost:4200

-Performs Purchase
-Display transaction status
-Money is entered in multiples of 5
-System validate Money field for false input


Page 2 of the Project: Report Page

url: http://localhost:4200/report

-Purchase History Bu,contains all the purchases made in the system.
-History In Range button, allowys you to enter date from, date to, item, and price. And the History of that specific item 
will be displayed
